channel.title: Help Please - Changing Login Welcome Popup Window

item.title: Help Please - Changing Login Welcome Popup Window
item.dc:creator: @Just_Lurkin Just Lurkin
item.description:
@Just_Lurkin wrote:

Hey I need some help changing the login window that pops up on login.
Screen shot link:
(view it in the fullscreen option)

http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=1e04dh&s=5

I tried changing then deleting this this under Client.java

sendMessage(“Alert##Welcome to !##Website: WWW..Com!”);
outStream.createFrame(249);
outStream.writeByteA(1);
outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(playerId);
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (j == playerId)
continue;
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName))
disconnected = true;

Thanks, any help is appreciated!
